cRefPattern.p: This pattern references a specific line.
This pattern references an inscribed surface on an object.

div.l: Bearing a ... aura, wearing(?) a great aura ...
... flourishing sapling(?) ...
... towards/on behalf of the true(?) ...
... in/of the universe, the supreme vizier ...
... of Enlil, a name/year(s) ...
An(?) and Enlil ... to/for Suen, ...
Protective aegis(?) of the universe, authoritative(?) ušum creature, supremely singular(?) ...
Your vizier Alamuš, suited for justice like Utu ...
In the Ekišnugal, (possessing) the greatest(?) name, exalted(?) ...
May he (Alamuš?) serve you in the ... of the land, your eye/face ...
... your eye/face ... in heaven, ...
... towards/on behalf of(?) the ... of Enlil, the youth Suen ... from the Ekur ...
... towards(?) shrine Ekišnugal ...
... the supreme storehouse(?) ...
... breath of(?) life ...
Enannedu, appropriate one of ...
Ornament of(?) the Ekišnugal temple, pious one, who fears(?)...
May her(!?) head be raised (wearing) the crown of en-ship, ...
Her breath of life ... in the Ekišnugal temple, may? she(?) be an unwavering en priestess ...
Enannedu, en priestess, your free will offering/heart's desire(?) ..., in the manner of(?) ancient days
... en priestess, radiating light of heaven ... planned/paid attention to ...
Beloved of the heart, true word(?) ...
Enannedu, true en priestess, attentive ...
... dwelling(?) of life, rejoicing heart ...
... month of abundance, a year of joy(?) ... heart ...
... the supreme storehouse(?) ... the pure cosmic powers ...
